title: The Stonecutter
text:
Chisel chips away,
slivers fall silent.
What seems destruction
is in truth
revelation.

title: The Gatekeeper
text:
Eyes like iron,
keys at his belt.
Not all thresholds
are crossed freely—
some must be earned.
